蠰字的基本解释

蠰
náng
〔蟷蠰〕见“
蟷”。

蠰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shàng］
［《廣韻》色莊切，平陽，書。］
［《廣韻》式亮切，去漾，書。］
一种形似天牛的桑树害虫。
[②]［náng］
［《廣韻》奴當切，平唐，泥。］
见“螳蠰”。
[③]［rǎng］
［《廣韻》如兩切，上養，日。］
见“蠰3谿”。

蠰字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠰； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1103第09
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?式亮切，音餉。【爾雅·釋蟲】蠰，齧桑。【註】似天牛，長角，體有白點，喜齧桑樹作孔，入其中。江東呼爲齧髮。　又師莊切，音霜。義同。　又【廣韻】如兩切，音壤。【爾雅·釋蟲】土螽，蠰谿。【註】似蝗而小，今謂之土?。　又【集韻】奴當切，音囊。蟷蠰。詳蟷字註。　又如陽切，音穰。義同。　亦作?。

蠰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蠰字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shàng］
["Guangyun" Se Zhuangqie, Pingyang, book. ]
["Guangyun" style bright cut, go to Yang, book. ]
A mulberry pest resembling a longhorn beetle.
[②]［náng］
["Guangyun" Slave Dangqie, Ping Tang, mud. ]
See "Manclay".
[③] [rǎng]
["Guangyun" is like two cuts, upper raising, day. ]
See "The Three Streams".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠰; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 1103 Page 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? style bright cut, sound rates. 【Erya·Release Insects】Cercus, biting mulberry. [Note] It resembles a longhorn beetle with long horns and white spots on the body. It likes to bite the mulberry tree as a hole and enter it. Jiang Dong called for biting hair.　 Shizhuang cut again, Yin Shuang. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] It's like two cuts, sound earth. 【Erya·Release Insects】Soil insects, beetle rivers. [Note] It's like a locust but small, now it's called the soil?.　[Jiyun] Slave cut, sound capsule.蟷蠰. Note in detail.　It's like Yang Qi, Yin Rang. The same meaning.　 also for?.
